sections.heading: Exemption of pensions from process; prohibition on assignments; exception9-931
sections.text: Exemption of pensions from process; prohibition on assignments; exceptionA. No pension allowed under this article shall be subject to garnishment, attachment, judgment, execution or other legal process. No person entitled
